deploy.abapAppDescLength: Deployment Description should not exceed 60 characters
deploy.abapTransportNumRequired: Provide a transport request for your application
deploy.abapInvalidNamespace: Namespace invalid as there are too many forward slashes
deploy.abapInvalidAppNameLength: Application name limited to 15 characters, entered {{length}}
deploy.abapInvalidAppName: Application name needs to be prefixed with [{{prefix}}]
deploy.charactersForbiddenInAppName: Only alphanumeric, underscore and slash characters are allowed
deploy.invalidAppNameMultipleReason: Application name is invalid for multiple reasons:

ui5.namespaceMustStartWithLetter: The namespace must start with a letter
ui5.namespaceEndInPeriod: The namespace cannot end with a period
ui5.namespaceNumberAfterPeriod: A number cannot follow a period in the namespace
ui5.lowerAlphaNumericOnly: Please use lowercase alpha numeric characters only
ui5.lowerAlphaNumericDotsOnly: Please use lowercase alpha numeric characters and dots only for the namespace.
ui5.namespaceSpecialCharacter: The namespace can only contain letters, digits, dots, and underscores
ui5.moduleNameMustStartWithLetter: The module name must start with a letter
ui5.nameCombinedTooLong: The combined length of the namespace and module name must not exceed {{length}} characters
ui5.folderDoesNotExist: Folder does not exist. Please enter the root folder for your project
ui5.folderDoesNotHaveCorrectPermissions: Selected folder does not have required permissions. Please ensure you have permission to write to the selected folder and try again.
ui5.nameNotString: Module name must be a string
ui5.nameLengthZero: Module name's length must be greater than zero
ui5.nameStartsWithPeriod: Module name cannot start with a period
ui5.nameStartsWithUnderscore: Module name cannot start with an underscore
ui5.nameStartsOrEndsWithSpace: Module name cannot contain leading or trailing spaces
ui5.nameTooLong: Module name cannot contain more than {{length}} characters
ui5.nameTooShort: Module name must be at least {{length}} characters
ui5.nameContainsSpecialCharacters: Module name cannot contain special characters ("~'!()*)
ui5.nameNotUrlFriendly: Module name can only contain URL-friendly characters
ui5.moduleAlreadyExists: The module folder named: {{folderName}} already exists at the specified path
ui5.appFolderExistsAtPath: A module with this name already exists in the folder: {{-path}}
ui5.folderContainsFioriApp: The project folder path already contains an SAP Fiori application in the folder: {{-path}}. Please choose a different folder and try again.
ui5.folderContainsCapApp: The selected project folder is part of an existing CAP project. This application must therefore use the local CAP project as the data source.

general.invalidClient: [{{client}}] is invalid. Leave empty or enter value between 000-999
general.invalidValueForSpecialChars: Input must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters or the following symbols: '-','_','$' and '.'
general.supportedFormats: Only alphanumeric and '{{allowedCharacters}}' characters are allowed

adp.projectNameUppercaseError: The name cannot contain uppercase letters.
adp.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The name cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The name must contain only latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The name cannot start with the word 'customer', or contain more than 61 characters, or end with the word 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The name must contain only latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. The different parts must be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.duplicatedProjectName: A project with this name already exists in your workspace. Please choose another name.
adp.differentNamespaceThanProjectName: The namespace must be the same as the project name.
adp.namespaceSameAsProjectNameError: The namespace must be the same as the project name.
adp.namespaceLengthError: The namespace cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
adp.namespaceValidationError: The namespace must contain only latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.
